localization.title: Localization
localization.intro: PlatformBlocks ships a lightweight i18n layer. Provide locale resource objects, wrap your app with I18nProvider, then translate via the tx prop or the useI18n hook.

steps.resources: Create JSON resource files per locale.
steps.provider: Wrap your app in the I18nProvider component.
steps.usageTx: Use <Text tx="localization.exampleGreeting" txParams={{ name: 'Ada' }} /> to render translated copy.
steps.usageHook: Or call const { t, setLocale, locale } = useI18n(); then t('localization.exampleGreeting', { name: 'Ada' }).
steps.switch: Switch locales by calling setLocale('fr') etc. Components re-render automatically.
steps.format: Use formatDate / formatNumber / formatRelativeTime helpers for localized formatting.
steps.missing: Missing keys fall back to fallbackLocale then return the key name (configurable via onMissingKey).
